WorkItem.Description:
Hello, I have an issue relative to the transparency of PNG images when using Excel2007 writer. 
 
I'm running PHPExcel 1.7.2 in a Windows OS. 
 
The point is that when I'm using the Excel5 writer all the images are displayed in a transparent background, but in Excel2007 the background turns white.
 
This is how I insert the drawings:
 
						$imgI = new PHPExcel_Worksheet_Drawing();
						$imgI->setName(lab_i($data['opc1']))
										->setDescription(lab_i($data['opc1']))
										->setPath("../imagenes/sign-".ico_i($data['opc1']))
										->setHeight(45)
										->setWidth(45)
										->setCoordinates('G'.$row)
										->setWorksheet($objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet());
 
 
I have to add that when I open the file I have marked the Solid Fill option in the Fill section of Image Format (with Excel2007 writer), but with Excel5 writer it is marked the No Fill option.
 
Regards,

Comments.Message:
Should be fixed in SVN tomorrow:
http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/SourceControl/list/changesets

Thak you very much, I have tested it and It's ok.

:)
